channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Stage Stars
channel.desc: It's fireworks night! There?s a big display at school, and everyone is there. The Encore dancers set up a stall to raise money for costumes and have enough sweets and treats for everyone ? but they need to sell them all. After months of rehearsals, it's finally opening night for Anything Goes - but will the cast hold their nerve and put on an outstanding performance.
